short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app helps to save words in other language with their menaings and practice them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Word Wise helps you save and practice words while learning Spanish or English. With this extension, you can memorize words in a fun way through a card game. Additionally, it shows you the level of memorization for each word, so you can focus on those you need to study more.

Version 1.1:
- Fix issue training words iwth multimple meanings. Sometimes all the correcto meanings where shown as options but only one of them was correct.
- Improved function to calculate the memory level indicator, this way last responses during training are more relevant.
